channel.title: How to autoupdate cache or delete then it updates?
channel.description: people have downloaded the old cache and i made some improvements to it and want to release my new client and they need there cache updated so they see the new improvements. like the client uses the cache alredy downloaded in the drive but if there isnt a cache it will download new one but only if there cache isnt there. and i want it to download new cache or just update it even tho they dont delete it?
